definition: to greet sb by word or action/to give prior notice
dozen (loanword)
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale

sentences.english: I delightedly hugged and greeted my grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 我愉快地擁抱了我的孫子孫女，和他們打招呼。

sentences.english: Greeting with Iranian, you need to address their surname with their academic or job title.
sentences.chinese: 和伊朗人打招呼，要稱他們的姓加上學術或職務頭銜。

sentences.english: Simba come down and greets his mother and Nala…
sentences.chinese: 辛巴走下來身他的母親和娜拉打招呼。

sentences.english: Will you say hello to your neighbor?
sentences.chinese: 你會主動和新鄰居打招呼嗎？

sentences.english: and you say "hi" to everyone that you see on the street.
sentences.chinese: 無論在街上遇到誰，你都可以跟他打招呼。

sentences.english: In Kenya the Massai people usually greet each other by spitting on his or her body.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亞馬塞族人用往對方身上吐口水的方式打招呼。

sentences.english: She looked me straight through when I greeted her.
sentences.chinese: 我跟她打招呼時她故意不理睬我。

sentences.english: She leaned out of the window and hailed a passerby.
sentences.chinese: 她探出車窗口，向一個過路人打招呼。

sentences.english: Finally they say hi and you practically drop to your knees with excitement.
sentences.chinese: 他們對你打招呼讓後你終於興奮得拜倒在他們腳下。

sentences.english: Tom said to his boss, with a smile on his face.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆滿臉堆笑地向老闆打招呼。

sentences.english: Millions greeted him when he returned to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 數以百萬計跟他打招呼，當他回到美國。

sentences.english: If I had seen you I definitely would have said hello.
sentences.chinese: 假如當時滓看到你的話，我一定會打招呼的。

sentences.english: Once he paused to salute some one in the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 一次，他停了嘴，向聽衆中的一個人打招呼。

sentences.english: She greeted him civilly but with no sign of affection.
sentences.chinese: 她禮貌地向他打招呼，但沒有一絲愛意。

sentences.english: The quick song link finished, Guo Fucheng opened the Rubik's cube and the outside dexterously greets.
sentences.chinese: 快歌環節結束，郭富城輕巧地打開魔方和外界打招呼。

definition: to say hello to/to send one's regards to
to call out to/to greet/to say hello to/to inform/to take care of/to take care that one does not
to talk/to get into conversation with/to send word
to shake hands
to worm one's way into being friends with sb (usually derogatory)
courtesy/manners
to chat
leave-taking/to say goodbye
to exchange conventional greetings/to talk about the weather
polite/courteous/formal/modest
to discuss/to converse/chat/discussion
to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
to send one's greetings/to send best regards/to devote attention to
affectionate/intimate/warmhearted/to get intimate with sb
to welcome sb with a smiling face (idiom)
to express thanks
